name: Voxel Battle: Chaos Awakens
description:
Earth has launched a brand-new satellite Epsilon to a remote planet in the outer solar system. It is remotely controlled from Earth! But, it has started to go into the planet's atmosphere and expected to crash soon. Now,  it has to send the information about the planet's atmosphere back to earth along with fighting with the trash along the way as it's last responsibility. Now, it is your duty to drag it along the way and help it achieve one of it's last goals.

Requirements:

Windows OS

Screen= 1920*1080

125% scale and layout
